name: Priya Sharma
comment: Amazing experience with Idea Holiday! The team planned every detail perfectly. Our Goa trip was absolutely fantastic, and the hotel recommendations were spot on.

name: Rajesh Kumar
comment: Excellent service and great value for money. The Rajasthan heritage tour was well-organized with comfortable stays and knowledgeable guides. Highly recommended!

name: Anita Desai
comment: Great planning for our Kerala backwater cruise. The customer support was very responsive and helped us modify our itinerary. Would definitely book again.

name: Vikram Singh
comment: Outstanding adventure tour to Ladakh! Every aspect was well-planned from accommodation to activities. The team's attention to detail made our trip memorable.

name: Meera Patel
comment: Wonderful Dubai experience! The city tour and desert safari were highlights. Smooth booking process and excellent customer service throughout.

name: Arjun Nair
comment: Perfect honeymoon package to Maldives! The resort was exactly as described and the overwater villa exceeded our expectations. Thank you for making it special!

name: Sneha Gupta
comment: Great family trip to Thailand! Kid-friendly activities and comfortable accommodations. The local guides were very helpful and spoke good English.

name: Rohit Agarwal
comment: Exceptional service for our Singapore trip! Everything from flights to hotel bookings was seamless. The 24/7 support during travel was very reassuring.
